requirements.text: A food-related or bioscience degree (minimum Bachelor's degree or equivalent) or a successfully completed food-related professional higher education.
requirements.minimum_acceptable: Bac +3 en domaine alimentaire ou bioscience

requirements.text: A minimum of 3 years full-time professional experience in the food industry, including quality assurance, food safety, R&D, or food safety inspection/enforcement.
requirements.minimum_acceptable: 3 ans d'expérience professionnelle à plein temps

requirements.text: Consultancy experience may be recognized for up to 1 year, provided it is documented.
requirements.minimum_acceptable: Expérience de conseil reconnue jusqu'à 1 an

requirements.text: Completed a recognized Lead Auditor course (e.g., IFS, IRCA) with a duration of at least 40 hours.
Completed a Food Hygiene and HACCP course with a duration of at least 2 days/16 hours.
Performed a minimum of 7 food safety audits (GFSI recognized food safety certification audits and/or second party audits) in the past 5 years.
requirements.minimum_acceptable: 7 audits de sécurité alimentaire dans les 5 dernières années

requirements.text: For candidates with no audit experience, participation in 7 audits is required, including 2 shadowing audits and 5 supervised audits.
requirements.minimum_acceptable: 7 audits avec 2 en observation et 5 supervisés

requirements.text: One year of professional experience in the food industry in relation to food processing activities for each applied product scope.
requirements.minimum_acceptable: 1 an d'expérience par domaine de produits

requirements.text: At least 5 audits per scope, including GFSI recognized or second party audits.
One year of professional experience in the food industry for each applied technology scope.
At least 5 audits per scope, including GFSI recognized or second party audits.
Proof of fluency in audit language via CEFR B2 certificate, 2 years work experience, or 10 audits conducted in that language.
requirements.minimum_acceptable: Maîtrise B2 de la langue d'audit
